div.p: ROTTBŒLLIA in botany ; a genus of the di-gynia order, belonging to the triandria claſs of plants. The rachis is jointed, roundiſh, and in many caſes filiform ; the calyx is ovate, lanceolated, flat, ſimple, or bipartite ; the florets are alteιnate on the winding rachis.
